titleInfo.title: Letter from Major General William Grant Keir, to Captain William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Following on from his previous letters (including f 20-20v), Grant Keir requests from Bruce any information he can offer of acts of piracy committed on the Persian coast, and of the Persian coast's ports, specifically Lingua [Bandar-e Lengeh], Mogar [MoghÅ«yeh], Tawani and Charrack [Karrak].
